apparent.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The difference in quality was immediately apparent.
He left suddenly, for no apparent reason.
It soon became apparent that we had a major problem.
It is apparent from scientific studies that the drug has some fairly nasty side effects.
it is apparent from something that
It was apparent to everyone that he was seriously ill.
it is apparent to somebody that
apparent.translation[0].definitions[1].d: seeming to have a particular feeling or attitude, although this may not be true
apparent.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He did well in his exams, despite his apparent lack of interest in his work.
